name: Radar
public_notice:
BotOcean has rebranded to Radar. For more information, visit https://twitter.com/radarprotocol
Radar has migrated to a new contract address (0xf03a2dc374d494fbe894563fe22ee544d826aa50). For more information, please read: https://radar.blog/radar-bsc-token-migration-a548024bd30c
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Radar is an all-in one DeFi protocol, offering maximum capital efficiency, almost limitless liquidity and fully decentralized social trading within a single ecosystem. Radar is to digital assets as google is to the internet; a required tool to bring forth the full functionality of the technology.
